thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 13 of 227
thread.title: TK

author: TK
title: TK
text: We had a special order as we wanted our sofa in a specific color. Originally it was going to be 8 weeks, but the date kept changing and it was more like 3 months. Someone also called us to schedule a delivery 2 weeks before we actually received our furniture, only to then find out our special order was NOT in yet. To make a long story short, that was a big source of aggravation and we're not happy with customer service. But we have no problems with the furniture itself. The delivery men were nice and put things exactly where we asked, and after removing the wrap, they hauled out the wrap with them. The sales people were also wonderful.
